arStrings.szText: Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} {c_important}{u}Dazes{/u}{/c} and applies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} to them for {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} seconds.
Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Shadow Step{/c} Stuns them for {c_number}{SF_25}{/c} seconds and reduces its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
After {c_important}Shadow Stepping{/c}, you gain {c_number}[{SF_24}*100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds.
